1.title: The Futility of Life
1.keyEvent: Life is vanity and all is meaningless

2.title: Pursuit of Pleasure
2.keyEvent: Pleasures and achievements fail to satisfy

3.title: A Time for Everything
3.keyEvent: There is a season for every purpose

4.title: Oppression and Toil
4.keyEvent: The misery of oppression and envy

5.title: Reverence for God
5.keyEvent: Fear God and keep His commandments

7.title: Wisdom and Folly
7.keyEvent: Wisdom is better than folly but limited

8.title: Obedience and Mystery
8.keyEvent: Obey the king and accept life's mysteries

9.title: The Common Destiny
9.keyEvent: Death comes to all, live wisely

10.title: Wisdom in Daily Life
10.keyEvent: Folly and wisdom affect daily affairs

11.title: Generosity and Youth
11.keyEvent: Be generous and remember youth's days

12.title: Remember Your Creator
12.keyEvent: Fear God before old age and death
